required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Serum Concentrations of Pregnancy-associated Proteins for Assessment of Gestational Age Before Abortion
clinical_study.official_title: Serum Concentrations of Pregnancy-associated Proteins for Assessment of Gestational Age Before Abortion

collaborator.agency: Family Planning Associates Medical Group, LTD
Planned Parenthood of Greater New York

brief_summary.textblock: This will be a case-series multicenter study enrolling 800 pregnant people. Serum will be collected from people seeking abortion and assayed at a qualified laboratory.

detailed_description.textblock:
Knowledge of gestational age (GA) is essential for guiding abortion care. In 2016, Gynuity Health Projects (GHP) launched a portfolio of research that aims to explore the possibility of developing a blood or urine test for this purpose.The goal of the present study is to validate initial study findings (protocol 8000) in a larger population of people seeking abortion.
Staff will obtain a serum specimen from each participant before any cervical manipulation is performed and before any abortifacient drug is administered. The site will send the specimens to a central facility for storage until assay. Serum assays for PAPP-A and possibly other proteins will be performed at a selected laboratory by qualified experts.

primary_outcome.description: Negative Predictive Value of Prespecified Protein Concentration in Serum for Predicting a GA of ≤70 days is >95%
Negative Predictive Value of Prespecified Protein Concentration in Serum for Predicting a GA of ≤105 days is >95%

study_pop.textblock: Pregnant people seeking abortion at multiple clinics that provide abortion through at least 18 weeks of gestation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant and seeking medical or surgical abortion
- Has had or will have an ultrasound on the day of study enrollment or earlier during the current pregnancy
- Able to provide blood and urine specimens before any trans-cervical procedure or mifepristone ingestion
- Not previously enrolled in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Does not meet Inclusion Criteria

facility.name: Planned Parenthood of New York City
